STEP 3 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED

STEP 5 - Check that the DUT returned Capabilities element STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Parse Capabilities element STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Compare Capabilities STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY
Test.Name: There is different Capabilities in the first and second request 1
Test.Description: There is different Capabilities in the first and second request (no EnableDisableAccessPointSupported in GetServiceCapabilities)

ACCESSCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
STEP 1 - Get Access Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePACS10/PACSService.asmx STEP PASSED

STEP 3 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check that the DUT returned Access Control service information STEP PASSED

STEP 6 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Parse Capabilities element STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Compare Capabilities EnableDisableAccessPointSupported field does not match (GetServices: True, GetServiceCapabilities: not specified) Settings don't match STEP FAILED
